column2: Upcasting a derived type to its base type is usually unnecessary.
column4: There is no need to upcast from [["ValidationError"|"relative:///service/src/main/java/uk/gov/mca/beacons/api/dto/ErrorResponseDTO.java:20:23:20:37"]] to [["Object"|"file:///modules/java.base/java/lang/Object.class:0:0:0:0"]] - the conversion can be done implicitly.
